Module capstone.schedulemanager
Package capstone.schedulemanager.dao

Class AppointmentsData

java.lang.Object
capstone.schedulemanager.dao.AppointmentsData
public abstract class AppointmentsData extends Object
This class provides the methods for access and manipulation of the appointments table data in the mysql database.

  • Method Details

    • getAptList

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getAptList()
      This method returns the data from the appointments table form the database as an observable array list. The database is queried for the column information from the appointments table. The data returned from the database is then stored as objects in an observable array list. Mysql Timestamp types are first converted to Local Date Time objects then Zone Date Time objects then back to Local Date Time objects to create instances of real time Local Date Time objects. LAMBDA EXPRESSION 1 (getConversion()): Converts Timestamp objects to Local Date Time objects. This expression is used for code reuse and simplification.
      Returns:
      appointments A list of the appointments and their data on the appointments table

    • insertAppt

      public static int insertAppt(int custId, String title, String description, String location, String type, Timestamp startDateAndTime, Timestamp endDateAndTime, Timestamp creatDt, String createdBy, Timestamp lastUpdt, String lastUpdtBy, int userId, int contactId, int appointmentId)
      This method inserts appointment data into the appointments table of the database. This method takes validated data acquired from the appointments page and inserts the data into the appointments table with the next highest appointment ID.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The appointment ID
      contactId - The contact ID
      creatDt - The created date
      createdBy - The created by user
      custId - The customer ID
      description - The description of the appointment
      endDateAndTime - The end date and time
      lastUpdt - The last updated date and time
      location - The location of the appointment
      lastUpdtBy - The user that last updated the appointment
      title - The title of the appointment
      type - The type of the appoinment
      startDateAndTime - The start and date time of the appoinment
      userId - The user ID of creator/updater of the appointment
      Returns:
      the amount of rows affected

    • updateAppointment

      public static int updateAppointment(String title, String description, String location, String type, Timestamp startDateAndTime, Timestamp endDateAndTime, Timestamp lastUpdt, String lastUpdtBy, int userId, int contactId, int aptId, int custId)
      This method updates the data of an existing appointment. This method takes validated data from the appointments page and updates the appointment's data with the matching appointment ID on the appointments table in the database.
      Parameters:
      aptId - The appointment ID
      contactId - The contact ID
      description - The description of the appointment
      endDateAndTime - The end date and time
      lastUpdt - The last updated date and time
      location - The location of the appointment
      lastUpdtBy - The user that last updated the appointment
      title - The title of the appointment
      type - The type of the appoinment
      startDateAndTime - The start and date time of the appoinment
      userId - The user ID of creator/updater of the appointment
      custId - The customer ID
      Returns:
      The number of rows affected

    • getNextAptId

      public static int getNextAptId()
      This method gets the next appointment ID after the highest appointment ID number on the appointments table in the database.
      Returns:
      lastNum + 1 The highest appointment ID number plus 1.

    • deleteAppointment

      public static int deleteAppointment(int aptId)
      This method deletes and appointment and returns an integer indicating whether the delete process was successful. This method takes an appointment ID and sends a mysql query to the database requesting the delete of an appointment that possesses the appointment ID. If the delete was successful the rows affected value is incremented.
      Parameters:
      aptId - The appointment ID to delete
      Returns:
      rowsAffected The number of rows affected by the delete

    • getAptsWtNmsList

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<AptWithName> getAptsWtNmsList()
      This method creates an observable list of all appointments on the database with the names of both the customer and contact whom are associated with the appointment.
      Returns:
      aptsWithNameApts the observable list with of appointments with the customer and contact names
